get.summary: Get the Sign In With Frequency Redirect URL

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: List of credentials using the types: "VerifiedGraphKeyCredential", "VerifiedEmailAddressCredential", and "VerifiedPhoneNumberCredential". Note that Contact related verifiable credentials will be nested into an anyOf request form.

parameters.name: permissions
parameters.description: The list of permissions using the Frequency Schema names and versions. Pattern: `<namespace>.<name>@v<version integer>` e.g. `dsnp.broadcast@v2`

parameters.name: callbackUrl
parameters.description: The URL that will be called when the authentication process is completed

post.summary: Process the result of a Sign In With Frequency v2 callback

get.summary: Get the Sign In With Frequency configuration

post.summary: Request to Sign In With Frequency

get.summary: Fetch an account given an MSA Id
Fetch an account given an Account Id

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

get.summary: Get a retireMsa unsigned, encoded extrinsic payload.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

post.summary: Request to retire an MSA ID.

201.description: Created and queued request to retire an MSA ID

get.summary: Get all delegation information associated with an MSA Id

parameters.name: msaId
parameters.description: MSA Id of the user requesting the delegation

get.summary: Get an MSA's delegation information for a specific provider

parameters.name: msaId
parameters.description: MSA Id of the user requesting the delegation

parameters.name: providerId
parameters.description: MSA Id of the provider to whom the requesting user wishes to delegate

get.summary: Get the delegation information associated with an MSA Id
Get a properly encoded RevokeDelegationPayload that can be signed

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

200.description: Returned an encoded RevokeDelegationPayload for signing

201.description: Created and queued request to revoke a delegation

post.summary: Request to create a new handle for an account

get.summary: Get a properly encoded ClaimHandlePayload that can be signed.

200.description: Returned an encoded ClaimHandlePayload for signing

get.summary: Fetch a handle given an MSA Id

post.summary: Add new control keys for an MSA Id

get.summary: Fetch public keys given an MSA Id
Get a properly encoded StatefulStorageItemizedSignaturePayloadV2 that can be signed.

parameters.name: msaId
parameters.description: MSA Id representing the target of this request

parameters.name: newKey
parameters.description: New public key to be added to the account (32-byte value in hex format)

200.description: Returned an encoded StatefulStorageItemizedSignaturePayloadV2 for signing

post.summary: Request to add a new public Key

get.summary: Check the health status of the service
Check the live status of the service
Check the ready status of the service

signedRequest.description: The base64url encoded JSON stringified signed request

frequencyRpcUrl.description: A publically available Frequency node for SIWF dApps to connect to the correct chain

redirectUrl.description: The compiled redirect url with all the parameters already built in

authorizationCode.description: The code returned from the SIWF v2 Authentication service that can be exchanged for the payload. Required unless an `authorizationPayload` is provided.

authorizationPayload.description: The SIWF v2 Authentication payload as a JSON stringified and base64url encoded value. Required unless an `authorizationCode` is provided.

id.description: The id type of the VerifiedGraphKeyCredential.

encodedPrivateKeyValue.description: The encoded private key. WARNING: This is sensitive user information!

encoding.description: How the encoded keys are encoded. Only "base16" (aka hex) currently.

format.description: Any addition formatting options. Only: "bare" currently.

controlKey.description: The ss58 encoded MSA Control Key of the login.

msaId.description: The user's MSA Id, if one is already created. Will be empty if it is still being processed.

graphKey.description: The users's Private Graph encryption key.

accountId.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format
AccountId in hex or SS58 format
AccountId in hex or SS58 format

providerId.description: MSA Id of the provider to whom the requesting user wishes to delegate

accountId.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

providerId.description: MSA Id of the provider to whom the requesting user wishes to delegate

expiration.description: expiration block number for this payload

accountId.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

proof.description: proof is the signature for the payload

encodedPayload.description: Raw encodedPayload is scale encoded of payload in hex format

msaId.description: MSA Id of the user requesting the new key

expiration.description: expiration block number for this payload

msaOwnerAddress.description: msaOwnerAddress representing the target of this request

msaOwnerSignature.description: msaOwnerSignature is the signature by msa owner

newKeyOwnerSignature.description: newKeyOwnerSignature is the signature with new key

index.description: index of the item to be deleted

targetHash.description: targetHash related to the stateful storage

expiration.description: expiration block number for this payload

accountId.description: AccountId in hex or SS58 format

proof.description: proof is the signature for the payload
